description: Main source file for a Flutter-based monthly budget tracker app. Contains models, app state management, main widget setup including theming, and UI screens for dashboard, transactions, budgets, and settings.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines constant colors used throughout the app for theming.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Model representing a budget category with id, name, icon, and color.

classes.name: BudgetTransaction
classes.description: Model representing a financial transaction with id, date, category, amount, and note.

classes.name: MonthlyBudget
classes.description: Model for monthly budget data including total budget and category-specific budgets.

classes.name: SeedData
classes.description: Provides seed sample data for categories, transactions, and monthly budget.

classes.name: BudgetState
classes.description: Main application state management class extending ChangeNotifier. Manages categories, transactions, budgets, filters, and user preferences.

classes.name: BudgetApp
classes.description: Root StatefulWidget setting up theme, providers, bottom navigation, and page routing.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays overall budget stats and category distribution visualizations.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Displays list and details of transactions with month filtering.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Allows editing overall and per-category budgets.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: Provides app preferences like theme toggle and currency selection.

classes.name: StatCard
classes.description: Reusable widget for displaying key statistics with icons.

classes.name: CategoryRingChart
classes.description: Custom painted ring chart for category budget distribution.

classes.name: MonthSelector
classes.description: Horizontal month picker widget for changing the current month filter.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point, initializes the Flutter app.

methods.name: fmtMoney
methods.description: Formats a double amount into a currency string with symbol.
